description.tchinese: 用鍋烹飪200次

description.english: Trade 50 times at the store
description.japanese: 帳場にて50回売買
description.schinese: 在摊贩处交易50次
description.tchinese: 在攤販處交易50次

description.english: Trade 100 times at the store
description.japanese: 帳場にて100回売買
description.schinese: 在摊贩处交易100次
description.tchinese: 在攤販處交易100次

description.english: Trade 200 times at the store
description.japanese: 帳場にて200回売買
description.schinese: 在摊贩处交易200次
description.tchinese: 在攤販處交易200次

description.english: Select "Try Again" 100 times
description.japanese: “再挑戦”を100回選択
description.schinese: 选择100次“重新挑战”
description.tchinese: 選擇100次“重新挑戰”

description.english: Select "Defy Death" 100 times
description.japanese: “黄泉帰”を100回選択
description.schinese: 选择100次“归于黄泉”
description.tchinese: 選擇100次“歸於黃泉”

description.english: Collect the Mizaru, Kikazaru, and Iwazaru Netsuke
description.japanese: “見猿”“聞か猿”“言わ猿”の根付を収集
description.schinese: 收集“观猴”、“闻猴”、“言猴”的坠饰
description.tchinese: 收集“觀猴”、“聞猴”、“言猴”的墜飾

description.english: Collect the Ebisu, Daikokuten, Bishamonten, Benzaiten, Hotei, Fukurokuju, and Jurojin Netsuke
description.japanese: “恵比須”“大黒天”“毘沙門天”“弁財天”“布袋”“福禄寿”“寿老人”の根付を収集
description.schinese: 收集“惠比寿”“大黑天”“毘沙门天”“弁财天”“布袋和室”“福禄寿”“寿老人”的坠饰
description.tchinese: 收集“惠比壽”“大黑天”“毘沙門天”“弁財天”“布袋和室”“福祿壽”“壽老人”的墜飾

description.english: Exterminate 20 Gaki in GYOU
description.japanese: 行にて“餓鬼類”を20体退治
description.schinese: 在行（修业）中消灭20只“饿鬼类”妖魔
description.tchinese: 在行（修業）中消滅20只“餓鬼類”妖魔
